Author: nickb
Content: Absolutely right. If the taste of chlorine bothers you, you could also get a Brita or some other filtering system. I abhor bottled water.

Author: far33d
Content: How is the grocery store good for water? Water is free if you rent. Bottled water is a marketing scam.
